1 Sp. Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
name: Kingdra

description_x: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
description_y: It is strong despite its compact size. It can easily pick up and carry an adult human on its back.
name: Phanpy

description_x: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its Tackle is strong enough to knock down a house.
description_y: The longer and bigger its tusks, the higher its rank in its herd. The tusks take long to grow,
name: Donphan

description_x: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.
description_y: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.
name: Porygon2

description_x: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.
description_y: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.
name: Stantler

description_x: It marks its territory by using its tail like a paintbrush. There are more than 5,000 different marks.
description_y: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
name: Smeargle

description_x: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.
description_y: To brush up on its fighting skills, it will challenge anyone. It has a very strong competitive spirit.
name: Tyrogue

description_x: It fights while spinning like a top. The centrifugal force boosts its destructive power by 10.
description_y: If you are enchanted by its smooth, dance-like kicks, you may get a closer experience with one than you'd like.
name: Hitmontop

description_x: Its lips are the most sensitive part of its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.
description_y: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.
name: Smoochum

description_x: It generates electricity by whirling its arms. However, it can't store the energy it makes.
description_y: Spinning its arms around to generate electricity makes the area between its horns shine light blue.
name: Elekid

description_x: It's small, but its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit. Embers escape its mouth and nose when it breathes.
description_y: Its magma-like blood circulates throughout its body. Its body's heat can top 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Magby

description_x: If it is around babies, the milk it produces contains much more nutrition than usual.
description_y: Its milk is packed with nutrition, making it the ultimate beverage for the sick or weary.
name: Miltank

description_x: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.
description_y: This kindhearted Pokémon nurses sick Pokémon to health. It senses feelings of sadness.
name: Blissey

description_x: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.
description_y: This rough Pokémon stores energy inside its body, then sweeps across the land, shooting off electricity
name: Raikou

description_x: A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
description_y: It is said that when it roars, a volcano erupts somewhere around the globe.
name: Entei

description_x: It races around the world to purify fouled water. It dashes away with the north wind.
description_y: Said to be the embodiment of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.
name: Suicune

description_x: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it falls asleep so it can grow.
description_y: Born deep underground, it comes aboveground and becomes a pupa once it has finished eating the surrounding soil.
name: Larvitar

description_x: Its body is as hard as bedrock. By venting pressurized gas, it can launch itself like a rocket.
description_y: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. Its thrashing can topple a mountain.
name: Pupitar

description_x: In just one of its mighty hands, it has the power to make the ground shake and mountains crumble.
description_y: If it rampages, it knocks down mountains and buries rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.
name: Tyranitar

description_x: It sleeps in a deep-sea trench. If it flaps its wings, it is said to cause a 40-day storm.
description_y: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.
name: Lugia

description_x: A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies.
description_y: It will reveal itself before a pure-hearted Trainer by shining its bright, rainbow-colored wings.
name: Ho-Oh

description_x: This Pokémon wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.
description_y: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.
name: Celebi

description_x: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day's weather.
description_y: Small hooks on the bottom of its feet catch on walls and ceilings. That is how it can hang from above.
name: Treecko

description_x: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.
description_y: It leaps from tree branch to tree branch quite swiftly. It shows astounding agility.
name: Grovyle

description_x: The leaves on its forelegs are as sharp as swords. It agilely leaps about the branches of trees to strike.
description_y: It agilely leaps about the jungle and uses the sharp leaves on its arms to strike its prey.
name: Sceptile

description_x: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if hugged.
description_y: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Torchic

description_x: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp creis to intimidate foes.
description_y: During a battle, the hot flame in its body increases. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.
name: Combusken

description_x: It can clear a 30-story building in a leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.
description_y: When facing a tough foe, it looses flames from its wrists. Its powerful legs let it jump clear over buildings.
name: Blaziken

description_x: Its large tail fin propels it through water with powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of its size.
description_y: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.
name: Mudkip

description_x: It is at its best when on muddy ground with poor footing. It quickly overwhelms foes struggling in mud.
description_y: Living on muddy ground that provides poor footing has made its legs sturdy.
name: Marshtomp

description_x: Its arms are rock-hard. With one swing, they can batter down its foe. It makes its nest on beautiful beaches.
description_y: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
name: Swampert

description_x: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
description_y: It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense of smell lets it chase a chosen prey without ever losing track.
name: Poochyena

description_x: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
description_y: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.
name: Mightyena

description_x: It walks in zigzag fashion. It's good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
description_y: A Pokémon with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigzags.
name: Zigzagoon

description_x: When running in a straight line, it can easily top 60 miles an hour. It has a tough time with curved roads.
description_y: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.
name: Linoone

description_x: It loves to eat leaves. If it is attacked by a Starly, it will defend itself with its spiked rear.
description_y: It lives among the tall grass and in forests. It repels attacks by raising up the spikes on its rear.
name: Wurmple

description_x: It wraps silk around the branches of a tree. It drinks rainwater on its silk while awaiting evolution.
description_y: It drinks dew that collects on its silk and waits for evolution. Its hard cocoon repels attacks.
name: Silcoon

description_x: Vibrantly patterned wings are its prominent feature. It sucks sweet flower nectar with its long mouth.
description_y: It has an aggressive nature. It stabs prey with its long, narrow mouth to drain the prey's fluids.
name: Beautifly

description_x: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
description_y: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
name: Cascoon

description_x: A nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.
description_y: It violently flutters its wings to scatter toxic dust when attacked. It becomes active after sunset.
name: Dustox

description_x: It looks like an aquatic plant and serves as a ferry to Pokémon that can't swim.
description_y: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.
name: Lotad

description_x: It lives at the water's edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water-grass by day and becomes active at night.
description_y: It has a mischievous spirit. If it spots an angler, it will tug on the fishing line to interfere.
name: Lombre

description_x: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.
description_y: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo's cells, making it more powerful.
name: Ludicolo

description_x: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.
description_y: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.
name: Seedot

description_x: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.
description_y: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.
name: Nuzleaf

description_x: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe's mind and take preemptive action.
description_y: By flapping its leafy fan, it can whip up gusts of 100 feet per second that can level houses.
name: Shiftry

description_x: It has a gutsy spirit that makes it bravely take on tough foes. It flies in search of warm climates.
description_y: It dislikes cold seasons. They migrate to other lands in search of warmth, flying over 180 miles a day.
name: Tailow

description_x: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.
description_y: It dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. It catches its prey with sharp claws.
name: Swellow

description_x: Catching sea winds with its long wings, it soars as if it were a glider. It folds its wings to rest.
description_y: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs. Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.
name: Wingull

description_x: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.
description_y: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.
name: Pelipper

description_x: If its horns capture the warm feelings of people or Pokémon, its body warms up slightly.
description_y: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.
name: Ralts

description_x: The cheerful spirit of its Trainer gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.
description_y: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.
name: Kirlia

description_x: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
description_y: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.
name: Gardevoir

description_x: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.
description_y: It appears as if it is skating on water. It draws prey with a sweet scent from the tip of its head.
name: Surskit

description_x: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings enable it to hover and fly in any direction.
description_y: It flaps its four wings to hover and fly freely in any direction--to and from and sideways.
evYield:
1 Sp. Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
name: Masquerain

description_x: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.
description_y: It spouts poison spores from the top of its head. These spores cause pain all over if inhaled.
name: Shroomish

description_x: Its short arms stretch when it throws punches. Its technique is equal to that of pro boxers.
description_y: It scatters poisonous spores and throws powerful punches while its foe is hampered by inhaled spores.
name: Breloom

description_x: The way Slakoth lolls around makes anyone who watches it feel like doing the same.
description_y: If it eats just three leaves a day, it is satisfied. Other than that, it sleeps for 20 hours a day.
name: Slakoth

description_x: Its hearbeat is fast and its blood so agitated that it can't sit still for one second.
description_y: Its stress level rises if it cannot keep moving constantly. Too much stress makes it feel sick.
name: Vigoroth

description_x: The world's laziest Pokémon. When it is lounging, it is actually saving energy for striking back.
description_y: It is the world's most slothful Pokémon However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.
name: Slaking

description_x: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.
description_y: It can sometimes live underground for more than 10 years. It absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees.
name: Nincada

description_x: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.
description_y: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.
name: Ninjask

description_x: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one's spirit.
description_y: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.
name: Shedinja

description_x: It usually murmurs but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.
description_y: If it senses danger, it scares the foe by crying out with the volume of a jet-plane engine.
name: Whismur

description_x: It shouts loudly by inhaling air, and then uses its well-developed stomach muscles to exhale.
description_y: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.
name: Loudred

description_x: It howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
description_y: Its roar in battle shakes the ground like a tremor--or like an earthquake has struck.
name: Exploud

description_x: It toughens up by slamming into thick trees over and over. It gains a sturdy body and dauntless spirit.
description_y: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pokémon that can withstand any attack.
name: Makuhita

description_x: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.
description_y: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.
name: Hariyama

description_x: A Pokémon that lives by water. It moves quickly on land by bouncing on its big tail.
description_y: It swings its large, nutrient-filled tail around to fight opponents bigger than itself.
name: Azurill

description_x: Its magnetic nose always faces north and draws iron objects to its body to protect itself better.
description_y: Its magnetic nose consistently faces north. Travellers check Nosepass to get their bearings.
name: Nosepass

description_x: It can't stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.
description_y: It shows its cute side by chasing its own tail until it gets dizzy.
name: Skitty

description_x: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.
description_y: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not keep a nest.
name: Delcatty

description_x: It hides in the darkness of caves. Its diet of gems has transformed its eyes into gemstones.
description_y: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.
name: Sableye

description_x: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.
description_y: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.
name: Mawile

description_x: It usually lives deep in mountains. However, hunger may drive it to eat railroad tracks and cars.
description_y: When it evolves, it sheds the steel carapace that covered its whole body and develops a new one.
name: Aron

description_x: It loves iron ore. Groups of them fight for territory by bashing one another with their steel bodies.
description_y: It habitually shows off its strength with the size of sparks it creates by ramming its steel body into boulders.
name: Lairon

description_x: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled, so don't take it lightly.
description_y: While seeking iron for food, it digs tunnels by breaking through bedrock with its steel horns.
name: Aggron

description_x: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.
description_y: It eats just one berry a day. By enduring hunger, its spirit is tempered and made sharper.
name: Meditite

description_x: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.
description_y: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe's next move.
name: Medicham

description_x: Using electricity stored in its fur, it stimulates its muscles to heighten its reaction speed.
description_y: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.
name: Electrike

description_x: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
description_y: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
name: Manectric

description_x: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It drains power from telephone poles.
description_y: It absorbs electricity from telephone poles. It shorts out its body to create crackling noises.
name: Plusle

description_x: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.
description_y: It cheers on friends. If its friends are losing, its body lets off more and more sparks.
name: Minun

description_x: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves Illumise's sweet aroma.
description_y: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.
name: Volbeat

description_x: Its fragrance attracts a swarm of Volbeat, so they draw over 200 patterns in the night sky.
description_y: With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw signs with light in the night sky.
name: Illumise

description_x: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.
description_y: Roselia that drink nutritionally rich springwater are said to reveal rare coloration when they bloom.
name: Roselia

description_x: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach comprises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.
description_y: There is nothing its stomach can't digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gasses are expelled.
name: Gulpin

description_x: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
description_y: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.
name: Swalot

description_x: They form packs to attack boats and rip out their hulls to sink them. They live in rivers in the jungle.
description_y: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.
name: Carvanha

description_x: Its fangs rip through sheet iron. It swims at 75 mph and is known as "The Bully of the Sea."
description_y: It can swim at speeds of 75 mph by jetting seawater through its body. It is the bandit of the sea.
name: Sharpedo

description_x: It bounces playfully like a ball. The more seawater it swallows, the higher it bounces.
description_y: It eats one ton of food every day. It plays by shooting stored seawater out its blowholes with great force.
name: Wailmer

description_x: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.
description_y: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.
name: Wailord

description_x: Its humped back stores intensely hot magma. In rain, the magma cools, slowing its movement.
description_y: The magma in its body reaches 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit. Its hump gets smaller when it uses Fire-type moves.
name: Numel

description_x: The volcanoes on its back have a major eruption every 10 years--or whenever it becomes really angry.
description_y: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.
name: Camerupt

description_x: You find abandoned coal mines full of them. They dig tirelessly in search of coal.
description_y: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.
name: Torkoal

description_x: It bounces constantly, using its tail like a spring. The shock of bouncing keeps its heart beating.
description_y: It bounces around on its tail to keep its heart pumping. It carries a pearl from Clamperl on its head.
name: Spoink

description_x: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does a strange dance to control foes' minds.
description_y: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.
name: Grumpig

description_x: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
description_y: The chances of two Spinda having identical spot patterns is less than one in four billion.
name: Spinda

description_x: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.
description_y: It makes an inescapable conical pit and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.
name: Trapinch

description_x: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
description_y: It generates ultrasonic waves by violently flapping its wings. After making its prey faint, it melts the prey with acid.
name: Vibrava

description_x: It hides itself by kicking up desert sand with its wings. Red covers shield its eyes from sand.
description_y: Known as "The Desert Spirit," this Pokémon hides in the sandstorms it causes by beating its wings.
name: Flygon

description_x: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.
description_y: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.
name: Cacnea

description_x: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day's desert heat.
description_y: Packs of them follow travellers through the desert until the travellers can no longer move.
name: Cacturne

description_x: For some reason, it likes to land on people's heads softly and act like it's a hat.
description_y: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.
name: Swablu

description_x: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you're in a dream.
description_y: On sunny days, it flies freely through the sky and blends into the clouds. It sings in a beautiful soprano.
name: Altaria

description_x: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.
description_y: Its fur would all stand on end if it smelled a Seviper nearby. Its sharp claws tear up its foes.
name: Zangoose

description_x: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
description_y: Constant polishing makes the edge of the blade on its tail extremely sharp. It's Zangoose's archrival.
name: Seviper

description_x: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.
description_y: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike 40 years ago. Its stare can lull its foes to sleep.
name: Lunatone

description_x: Solar energy is the source of its power, so it is strong during the daytime. When it spins, its body shines.
description_y: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.
name: Solrock

description_x: It coats its entire body with a slimy fluid so it can squirm and slip away if grabbed.
description_y: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.
name: Barboach

description_x: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
description_y: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything--if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.
name: Whiscash

description_x: No matter how dirty the water in the river, it will adapt and thrive. It has a strong will to survive.
description_y: Its hardy vitality enables it to adapt to any environment. Its pincers will never release prey.
name: Corphish

description_x: It is a ruffian that uses its pincers to pick up and toss out other Pokémon from its pond.
description_y: Loving to battle, this Pokémon pinches all Pokémon that enter its territory with its pincers and throws them out.
name: Crawdaunt

description_x: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
description_y: It moves while spinning around on its single foot. Some Baltoy have been seen spinning on their heads.
name: Baltoy

description_x: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.
description_y: It is said that it originates from clay dolls made by an ancient civilization.
name: claydol

description_x: It disguises its tentacles as flowers to attract and catch prey. It became extinct in ancient times.
description_y: It lived on the seafloor 100 million years ago and was reanimated scientifically.
location_x: Revive Root Fossil - Fossil Exclusive to X
location_y: Revive Root Fossil - Fossil Exclusive to X
name: Lileep

description_x: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. When the tide goes out, it digs up prey from beaches.
description_y: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.
name: Cradily

description_x: It is a kind of Pokémon progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.
description_y: A Pokémon ancestor that was reanimated from a fossil. It lived in the sea and hunted with claws.
location_x: Revive Claw Fossil - Fossil Exclusive to X
location_y: Revive Claw Fossil - Fossil Exclusive to X
name: Anorith

description_x: Its enormous, retractable claws can cut through most anything. Its entire body is clad in sturdy plates.
description_y: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.
name: Armaldo

description_x: It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.
description_y: It is the shabbiest Pokémon of all. It forms in schools and lives at the bottom of rivers.
name: Feebas

description_x: Milotic is breathtakingly beautiful. Those that see it are said to forget their combative spirits.
description_y: It is the world's most beautiful Pokémon. There are many works of art featuring Milotic.
name: Milotic

description_x: This Pokémon can change its cells, taking different forms based on the temperature and humidity.
description_y: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on the weather.
name: Castform

description_x: It can freely change its body's color. The zigzag pattern on its belly doesn't change, however.
description_y: It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.
name: Keckleon

description_x: It uses its horn to feed on envy and malice-- or so it's said. It's very active at night.
description_y: It loves vengeful emotions and hangs in rows under the eaves of houses where vengeful people live.
name: Shuppet

description_x: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
description_y: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a Pokémon. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.
name: Banette

description_x: It doggedly pursues its prey wherever it goes. However, the chase is abandoned at sunrise.
description_y: If it finds bad children who won't listen to their parents, it will spirit them away--or so it's said.
name: Duskull

description_x: Anyone who dares peer into its body to see its spectral ball of fire will have their spirit stolen away.
description_y: Its body is hollow. It is said that those who look into its body are sucked into the void.
name: Dusclops

description_x: It flies by flapping its broad leaves and gives the sweet, delicious fruit around its neck to children.
description_y: The bunch of fruit around its neck ripens twice a year and is delicious. It's a highly favored tropical snack.
name: Tropius

description_x: It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a tree or from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.
description_y: Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travel great distances.
evYield:
1 Sp. Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
name: Chimecho

description_x: It senses coming disasters and appears before people only to warn them of impending danger.
description_y: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom bringer.
name: Absol

description_x: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.
description_y: It grows strong by pushing up against others en masse. It loves eating sweet fruit.
name: Wynaut

description_x: It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant leaves and live together in harmony.
description_y: In the snow country, certain folklore says a house will prosper if a Snorunt lives there.
name: Snorunt

description_x: To protect itself, it clad its body in an armor of ice, made by freezing moisture in the air.
description_y: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
name: Glalie

description_x: They can't swim well yet, and they move much faster by rolling. When they're happy, they clap fins.
description_y: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.
name: Spheal

description_x: It has a very sensitive nose. It touches new things with its nose to examine them.
description_y: Be it Spheal or Poké Ball, it will spin any round object on its nose with the greatest of ease.
name: Sealeo

description_x: It shatters ice with its big tusks. Its thick blubber repels not only the cold, but also enemy attacks.
description_y: It shatters drift ice with its strong tusks. Its thick layer of blubber repels enemy attacks.
name: Walrein

description_x: When it evolves, it makes a mysterious pearl that amplifies psychic powers when it's held.
description_y: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.
name: Clamperl

description_x: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.
description_y: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.
name: Huntail

description_x: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.
description_y: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.
name: Gorebyss

description_x: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.
description_y: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.
name: Relicanth

description_x: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.
description_y: During the spawning season, countless Luvdisc congregate at coral reefs, turning the waters pink.
location_x: Route 8, 12, Azure Bay, Cyllage City - Fish
location_y: Route 8, 12, Ambrette Town, Azure Bay, Cyllage City - Fish
name: Luvdisc

description_x: Its well-developed neck muscles and iron-like head can smash boulders into pieces.
description_y: Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping off cliffs every day.
name: Bagon

description_x: Within its rugged shell, its cells have begun changing. The shell peels off the instant it evolves.
description_y: Its armored body makes all attacks bounce off. The armor is too tough, however, making it heavy and somewhat sluggish.
name: Shelgon

description_x: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
description_y: It's uncontrollable if enraged. It flies around spouting flames and scorching fields and mountains.
name: Salamence

description_x: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.
description_y: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.
name: Beldum

description_x: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its steel body won't be scratched if it collides with a jet.
description_y: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its two brains are linked, amplifying its psychic power.
name: Metang

description_x: With four linked brains, it's more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.
description_y: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.
name: Metagross

description_x: Its entire body is made of rock. If any part chips off in battle, it attaches rocks to repair itself.
description_y: The same rocks that form its body have been found in ground layers around the world.
name: Regirock

description_x: It is said to have slept in a glacier for thousands of years. Its body can't be melted, even by magma.
description_y: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Regice

description_x: Tempered by pressure underground over tens of thousands of years, its body cannot be scratched.
description_y: Its body is said to be harder than any kind of metal. A study has revealed that its body is hollow.
name: Registeel

description_x: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.
description_y: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
name: Latias

description_x: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
description_y: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender Pokémon that dislikes fighting.
name: Latios

description_x: A mythical Pokémon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon
description_y: It is said to have widened the seas by causing downpours. It had been asleep in a marine trench.
name: Kyogre

description_x: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre
description_y: It had been asleep in underground magma ever since it fiercely fought Kyogre long ago.
name: Groudon

description_x: It lives in the ozone layer far above the clouds and cannot be seen from the ground.
description_y: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.
name: Rayquaza

description_x: Generations have believed that any wish written on a note on its head will come true when it awakens.
description_y: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.
name: Jirachi

description_x: An alien virus that fell to earth on a meteor underwent a DNA mutation to become this Pokémon.
description_y: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.

description_x: Photosynthesis occurs across its body under the sun. The shell on its back is actually hardened soil.
description_y: It undertakes photosynthesis with its body, making oxygen. The leaf on its head wilts if it is thirsty.
name: Turtwig

description_x: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
description_y: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
name: Grotle

description_x: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.
description_y: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.
name: Torterra

description_x: Its fiery rear end is fueled by gas made in its belly. Even rain can't extinguish the fire.
description_y: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.
name: Chimchar

description_x: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.
description_y: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.
name: Monferno

description_x: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.
description_y: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.
evYield:
1 Attack Point(s)
1 Speed Point(s)
1 Sp. Attack Point(s)
name: Infernape

description_x: It doesn't like to be taken care of. It's difficult to bond with since it won't listen to its Trainer.
description_y: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.
name: Piplup

description_x: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.
description_y: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.
name: Prinplup

description_x: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.
description_y: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.
name: Empoleon

description_x: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.
description_y: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.
name: Starly

description_x: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.
description_y: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.
name: Staravia

description_x: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small Pokémon.
description_y: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
name: Staraptor

description_x: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.
description_y: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.
name: Bidoof

description_x: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.
description_y: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.
name: Bibarel

description_x: It chats with others using the sounds of its colliding antennae. These sounds are fall hallmarks.
description_y: When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the music of a xylophone.
name: Kricketot

description_x: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.
description_y: It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists are studying these melodic patterns.
name: Kricketune

description_x: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.
description_y: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.
name: Shinx

description_x: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.
description_y: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.
name: Luxio

description_x: When its eyes gleam gold, it can spot hiding prey--even those taking shelter behind a wall.
description_y: Luxray's ability to see through objects comes in handy when it's scouting for danger.
name: Luxray

description_x: When it feels the sun's warm touch, it opens its bud to release pollen. It lives alongside clear pools.
description_y: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.
name: Budew

description_x: Luring prey with a sweet scent, it uses poison whips on its arms to poison, bind, and finish off the prey.
description_y: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.
name: Roserade

description_x: It was resurrected from an iron ball-like fossil. It downs prey with its headbutts.
description_y: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.
name: Cranidos

description_x: Its skull withstands impacts of any magnitude. As a result, its brain never gets the chance to grow.
description_y: Its skull is a hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.
name: Rampardos

description_x: It habitually polishes its face by rubbing it against tree trunks. It is weak to attacks from behind.
description_y: It was generated from a fossil dug out of a layer of clay that was older than anyone knows. It has a sturdy face.
name: Shieldon

description_x: When they lined up side by side, no foe could break through. They shielded their young in that way.
description_y: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.
name: Bastiodon

description_x: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
description_y: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.
name: Burmy

description_x: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
description_y: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon's body. The cloak is never shed.
evYield:
Plant Cloak

1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
name: Wormadam

description_x: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
description_y: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.
name: Mothim

description_x: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
description_y: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
name: Combee

description_x: It houses its colony in cels in its body and releases various pheromones to make those grubs do its bidding
description_y: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee.
name: Vespiqueen

description_x: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
description_y: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.
name: Pachirisu

description_x: It swims by rotating its two tails like a screw. When it dives, its flotation sac collapses.
description_y: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.
name: Buizel

description_x: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
description_y: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.
location_x:
Route 15, Route 16, Route 21, Frost Cavern, Couriway Town, Victory Road
Friend Safari
location_y:
Route 15, Route 16, Route 21, Frost Cavern, Couriway Town, Victory Road
Friend Safari
name: Floatzel

description_x: Sunlight colors it red. When the small ball is drained of nutrients, it shrivels to herald evolution.
description_y: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.
name: Cherubi

description_x: During times of strong sunlight, its bud blooms, its petals open fully, and it becomes very active.
description_y: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.
name: Cherrim

description_x: Beware of pushing strongly on its squishy body, as it makes a mysterious purple fluid ooze out.
description_y: Its shape and coloration vary, depending on its habitat.
name: Shellos

description_x: When its natural enemy attacks, it oozes purple fluid and escapes.
description_y: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.
name: Gastrodon

description_x: They work in large colonies and make rings by linking their tails, apparently in friendship.
description_y: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.
name: Ambipom

description_x: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.
description_y: These Pokémon are called the "Signpost for Wandering Spirits." Children holding them sometimes vanish.
name: Drifloon

description_x: It carries people and Pokémon when it flies. But since it only drifts, it can end up anywhere.
description_y: It's drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.
name: Drifblim

description_x: Its ears are always rolled up. They can be forcefully extended to shatter even a large boulder.
description_y: When it senses danger, it perks up its ears. On cold nights, it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.
name: Buneary

description_x: Extremely cautious, it quickly bounds off when it senses danger.
description_y: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.
name: Lopunny

description_x: It chants incantations. While they usually torment targets, some chants bring happiness.
description_y: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.
evYield:
1 Sp. Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
name: Mismagius

description_x: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
description_y: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.
name: Honchkrow

description_x: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.
description_y: When it's happy, Glameow demonstrates beautiful movements of its tail, like a dancing ribbon.
name: Glameow

description_x: It would claim another Pokémon's nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.
description_y: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.
name: Purugly

description_x: Each time it hops, it makes a ringing sound. It deafens foes by emitting high-frequency cries.
description_y: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.
name: Chingling

description_x: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.
description_y: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.
name: Stunky

description_x: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.
description_y: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.
name: Skuntank

description_x: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.
description_y: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.
name: Bronzor

description_x: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
description_y: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.
name: Bronzong

description_x: It prefers arid environments. It leaks water from its eyes to adjust its body's fluid levels.
description_y: It prefers and arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.
name: Bonsly

description_x: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
description_y: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.
name: Mime Jr.

description_x: It carries a round, egg-shaped rock in its belly pouch and gives the rock to its friends.
description_y: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It's bothered by how curly its hair looks.
name: Happiny

description_x: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.
description_y: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.
name: Chatot

description_x: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone
description_y: It was bound to a fissure in an odd keystone as punishment for misdeeds 500 years ago.
name: Spiritomb

description_x: It nests in horizontal holes warmed by geothermal heat. Foes who get too close can expect to be pounced on and bitten.
description_y: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.
name: Gible

description_x: It love sparkly things. It seeks treasures in caves and hoards the loot in its nest.
description_y: As it digs to expand its nest, it habitually digs up gems that it then hoards in its nest.
name: Gabite

description_x: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
description_y: It flies at speeds equals to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
name: Garchomp

description_x: It hides food under its long body hair. However, it forgets it has hidden the food.
description_y: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.
name: Munchlax

description_x: It uses the shape of auras, which change according to emotion, to communicate with others.
description_y: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.
name: Riolu

description_x: By catching the aura emanating from others, it can read their thoughts and movements.
description_y: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.
name: Lucario

description_x: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.
description_y: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.
name: Hippopotas

description_x: It brandishes its gaping mouth in a display of fearsome strength. It raises vast quantities of sand while attacking.
description_y: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.
name: Hippowdon

description_x: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.
description_y: It burrows under the sand to lie in wait for prey. Its tail claws can inject its prey with a savage poison.
name: Skorupi

description_x: It takes pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.
description_y: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.
name: Drapion

description_x: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.
description_y: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.
name: Croagunk

description_x: It has a poison sac at its throat. When it croaks, the stored poison is churned for greater potency.
description_y: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.
name: Toxicroak

description_x: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.
description_y: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.
name: Carnivine

description_x: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.
description_y: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.
name: Finneon

description_x: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.
description_y: To avoid detection by predators, it crawls along the seafloor using the two fins on its chest.
name: Lumineon

description_x: The pattern on its back varies by region. It often swims in a school of Remoraid.
description_y: When it swims close to the surface of the ocean, people aboard ships are able to observe the pattern on its back.
name: Mantyke

description_x: During cold seasons, it migrates to the mountain's lower reaches. It returns to the snow-covered summit in the spring.
description_y: In the spring, it grows berries with the texture of frozen treats around its belly.
name: Snover

description_x: It blankets wide areas in snow by whipping up blizzards. It is also known as "The Ice Monster."
description_y: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.
name: Abomasnow

description_x: It lives in snowy regions. It carves patterns in trees with its claws as a signal to others.
description_y: They live in cold regions, forming groups of four or five that hunt prey with impressive coordination.
name: Weavile

description_x: Sometimes the magnetism emitted by Magnezone is too strong, making them attract each other so they cannot move.
description_y: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.
name: Magnezone

description_x: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.
description_y: Their saliva contains lots of components that can dissolve anything. The numbness caused by their lick does not dissipate.
name: Lickilicky

description_x: From holes in its palms, it fires out Geodude. Its carapace can withstand volcanic eruptions.
description_y: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at rare times.
name: Rhyperior

description_x: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.
description_y: Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm season, you can't even see its eyes.
name: Tangrowth

description_x: As its electric charge amplifies, blue sparks begin to crackle between its horns.
description_y: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.
name: Electivire

description_x: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.
description_y: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.
name: Magmortar

description_x: As everyone knows, it visits peaceful regions, bringing them gifts of kindness and sweet blessings.
description_y: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another's rights and avoid needless strife.
evYield:
2 Sp. Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
name: Togekiss

description_x: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes' heads instantly while flying at high speed.
description_y: This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.
name: Yanmega

description_x: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
description_y: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.
name: Leafeon

description_x: By controlling its body heat, it can freeze the atmosphere around it to make a diamond-dust flurry.
description_y: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.
name: Glaceon

description_x: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!
description_y: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do the rest.
name: Gliscor

description_x: A frozen Mamoswine was dug from ice dating back 10,000 years. This Pokémon has been around a long, long, long time.
description_y: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.
name: Mamoswine

description_x: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.
description_y: Its programming was modified to enable it to travel through alien dimensions. Seems there might have been an error...
name: Porygon-Z

description_x: Because it can sense what its foe is thinking, its attacks burst out first, fast, and fierce.
description_y: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.
name: Gallade

description_x: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses
description_y: It freely controls three small units called Mini-Noses using magnetic force.
name: Probopass

description_x: It is said to take lost spirits into its pliant body and guide them home.
description_y: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.
name: Dusknoir

description_x: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees Fahrenheit. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.
description_y: Legends in snowy regions say that a woman who was lost on an icy mountain was reborn as Froslass.
name: Froslass

description_x: Research continues on this Pokémon, which could be the power source of a unique motor.
description_y: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.
name: Rotom

description_x: Known as Ã¢â‚¬Å“The Being of Knowledge.Ã¢â‚¬Â It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.
description_y: It is said that its emergence gave humans the intelligence to improve their quality of life.
name: Uxie

description_x: Known as Ã¢â‚¬Å“The Being of Emotion.Ã¢â‚¬Â It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.
description_y: It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to leave its body to fly on the lake's surface.
evYield:
1 Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
name: Mesprit

description_x: Known as Ã¢â‚¬Å“The Being of Willpower.Ã¢â‚¬Â It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.
description_y: It is thought that Uxie, Mesprit and Azelf all came from the same egg.
name: Azelf

description_x: A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.
description_y: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.
name: Dialga

description_x: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.
description_y: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.
name: Palkia

description_x: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
description_y: Boiling blood, like magma, circulates through its body. It makes its dwelling place in volcanic caves.
name: Heatran

description_x: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.
description_y: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.
name: Regigigas

description_x: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.
description_y: It was banished for its violence. It silently gazed upon the old world from the Distortion World.
name: Giratina

description_x: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
description_y: Those who sleep holding Cresselia's feather are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.
name: Cresselia

description_x: When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac on their heads and drift languidly on the sea in packs.
description_y: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.
name: Phione

description_x: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.
description_y: It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.
name: Manaphy

description_x: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.
description_y: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.
name: Darkrai

description_x: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.
description_y: The blooming of Gracidea flowers confers the power of flight upon it. Feelings of gratitude are the message it delivers.
name: Shaymin

description_x: According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémon emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in this world.
description_y: It is told in mythology that this Pokémon was born before the universe even existed.
name: Arceus

description_x: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
description_y: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.
name: Victini

description_x: Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter. It uses vines more adeptly than its hands.
description_y: They photosynthesize by bathing their tails in sunlight. When they are not feeling well, their tails droop.
name: Snivy

description_x: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.
description_y: When it gets dirty, its leaves can't be used in photosynthesis, so it always keeps itself clean.
name: Servine

description_x: It only gives its all fighting against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from Serperior's noble eyes.
description_y: It can stop its opponents'movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.
name: Servine

description_x: It can deftly dodge its foe's attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.
description_y: It loves to eat roasted berries, but sometimes it gets too excited and burns them to a crisp.
name: Tepig

description_x: The more it eats, the more fuel it has to make the fire in its stomach stronger. This fills it with even more power.
description_y: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.
name: Pignite

description_x: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.
description_y: It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves. It grows a beard of fire.
name: Emboar

description_x: The scalchop on its stomach isn't just used for battle--it can be used to break open hard berries as well.
description_y: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.
name: Oshawott

description_x: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.
description_y: As a result of strict training, each Dewott learns different forms for using the scalchops.
name: Dewott

description_x: In the time it takes a foe to blink, it can draw and sheathe the seamitars attached to its front legs.
description_y: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.
name: Samurott

description_x: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.
description_y: Extremely cautious, one of them will always be on the lookout, but it won't notice a foe coming from behind.
name: Patrat

description_x: Using luminescent matter, it makes its eyes and body glow and stuns attacking opponents.
description_y: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.
name: Watchdog

description_x: The long hair around its face provides an amazing radar that lets it sense subtle changes in its surroundings.
description_y: Though it is a very brave Pokémon, it's also smart enough to check its foe's strength and avoid battle.
name: Lillipup

description_x: This very loyal Pokémon helps Trainers, and it also takes care of other Pokémon.
description_y: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.
name: Herdier

description_x: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.
description_y: Being wrapped in its long fur is so comfortable that a person would be fine even overnight on a wintry mountain.
name: Stoutland

description_x: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken, It attacks with sharp claws.
description_y: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can't help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.
name: Purrloin

description_x: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.
description_y: Stealthily, it sneaks up on its target, striking from behind before its victim has a chance to react.
name: Liepard

description_x: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
description_y: It's good at finding berries and gathers them from all over. It's kind enough to share them with friends.
name: Pansage

description_x: It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.
description_y: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.
name: Simisage

description_x: Very intelligent, it roasts berries before eating them. It likes to help people.
description_y: This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Pansear

description_x: A flame burns inside its body. It scatters embers from its head and tail to sear its opponents.
description_y: When it gets excited, embers rise from its head and tail and it gets hot. For some reason, it loves sweets.
name: Simisear

description_x: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with it using its tail.
description_y: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.
name: Panpour

description_x: The high-pressure water expelled from its tail is so powerful, it can destroy a concrete wall.
description_y: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.
name: Simipour

description_x: This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.
description_y: It eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a pleasant dream, it expels pink-colored mist.
name: Munna

description_x: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.
description_y: The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.
name: Musharna

description_x: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.
description_y: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.
name: Pidove

description_x: Many people believe that, deep in the forest where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no war.
description_y: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets seperated from its Trainer.
name: Tranquil

description_x: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females' flying abilities surpass those of the males.
description_y: Males have plumage on their heads. They will never let themselves feel close to anyone other than their Trainers.
name: Unfezant

description_x: When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear. It can catch lightning with its mane and store the electricity.
description_y: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.
name: Blitzle

description_x: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
description_y: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.
name: Zebstrika

description_x: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.
description_y: They were discovered a hundred years ago in an earthquake fissure. Inside each one is an energy core.
name: Roggenrola

description_x: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked out and formed orange crystals.
description_y: When it is healthy, its core sticks out. Always facing the same way, it swiftly moves front to back and left to right.
name: Boldore

description_x: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.
description_y: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
name: Gigalith

description_x: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.
description_y: The heart-shaped mark left on a body after a Woobat has been attached to it is said to bring good fortune.
location_x:
Glittering Cave, Reflection Cave
Friend Safari
location_y:
Glittering Cave, Reflection Cave
Friend Safari
name: Woobat

description_x: It shakes its tail vigorously when it emits ultrasonic waves strong enough to reduce concrete to rubble.
description_y: Anyone who comes into contact with the ultrasonic waves emitted by a courting male experiences a positive mood shift.
name: Swoobat

description_x: It makes its way swiftly through the soil by putting both claws together and rotating at high speed.
description_y: By spinning its body, it can dig straight through the ground at a speed of 30 mph.
name: Drilbur

description_x: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.
description_y: More than 300 feet below the surface, they build mazelike nests. Their activity can be destructive to subway tunnels.
name: Exadrill

description_x: Using the feelers on its ears, it can tell how someone is feeling or when an egg might hatch.
description_y: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
name: Audino

description_x: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
description_y: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
name: Timburr

description_x: With strengthened bodies, they skillfully wield steel beams to take down buildings.
description_y: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.
name: Gurdurr

description_x: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.
description_y: Rather than rely on force, they master moves that utilize the centrifugal force of spinning concrete.
name: Conkeldurr

description_x: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans and warns others of danger.
description_y: By vibrating its cheeks, it emits sound waves imperceptible to humans. It uses the rhythm of these sounds to talk.
name: Tympole

description_x: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.
description_y: It lives in the water and on land. It uses its long, sticky tongue to immobilize its opponents.
name: Palpitoad

description_x: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists. It can turn a boulder to rubble with one punch.
description_y: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.
name: Seismitoad

description_x: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts
description_y: When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.
name: Throh

description_x: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.
description_y: Tying their belts gets them pumped and makes their punches more destructive. Disturbing their training angers them.
name: Sawk

description_x: This Pokémon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
description_y: Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.
name: Sewaddle

description_x: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
description_y: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in leaves. It stays on the move, eating leaves in forests.
name: Swadloon

description_x: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
description_y: It keeps its eggs warm with heat from fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.
name: Leavanny

description_x: It discovers what is going on around it by using the feelers on its head and tail. It is brutally aggressive.
description_y: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.
name: Venipede

description_x: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.
description_y: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its opponent.
name: Whirlipede

description_x: It clasps its prey with the claws on its neck until it stops moving. Then it finishes it off with deadly poison.
description_y: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.
name: Scolipede

description_x: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.
description_y: Perhaps because they feel more at ease in a group, they stick to others they find. They end up looking like a cloud.
name: Cottonee

description_x: They appear along with whirlwinds. They pull pranks, such as moving furniture and leaving balls of cotton in homes.
description_y: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.
name: Whimsicott

description_x: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.
description_y: Since they prefer moist, nutrient-rich soil, the areas where Petilil live are known to be good for growing plants.
name: Petilil

description_x: The fragrance if the garland on its head has a relaxing effect. It withers if a trainer does not take good care of it.
description_y: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.
name: Lilligant

description_x: Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.
description_y: Red and blue Basculin usually do not get along, but sometimes members of one school mingle with the other's school.
name: Basculin

description_x: It moves along below the sand's surface, except for its nose and eyes. A dark membrane shields its eyes from the sun.
description_y: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.
name: Sandile

description_x: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.
description_y: The special membrane covering its eyes can sense the heat of objects, so it can see its surroundings even in darkness.
name: Krokorok

description_x: Very violent Pokémon, they try to clamp down on anything that moves in front of their eyes.
description_y: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.
name: Krookodile

description_x: Darumaka's droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
description_y: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 F.
name: Darumaka

description_x: When one is injured in a fierce battle, it hardens into a stone-like form. Then it meditates and sharpens its mind.
description_y: Its internal fire burns at 2,500Â° F, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.
evYield:
Standard
2 Attack Point(s)
Zen Mode
2 Sp. Attack Point(s)
name: Darmanitan
