description_x: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds
description_y: Arid regions are their habitat. They move rhythmically, making a sound similar to maracas.
name: Maractus

description_x: It makes a hole in a suitable rock. If that rock breaks, the Pokémon remains agitated until it locates a replacement.
description_y: When it finds a stone of a suitable size, it secretes a liquid from its mouth to open up a hole to crawl into.
location_x:
Route 8, Route 12, Ambrette Town, Cyllage City, Glittering Cave - Rock Smash
Friend Safari
location_y:
Route 8, Route 12, Ambrette Town, Cyllage City, Glittering Cave - Rock Smash
Friend Safari
name: Dwebble

description_x: It possesses legs of enormous strength, enabling it to carry heavy slabs for many days, even when crossing arid land.
description_y: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.
name: Crustle

description_x: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.
description_y: Proud of its sturdy skull, it suddenly headbutts everything, but its weight makes it unstable, too.
name: Scraggy

description_x: It pulls up its shed skin to protect itself while it kicks. The bigger the crest, the more respected it is.
description_y: It can smash concrete blocks with its kicking attacks. The one with the biggest crest is the group leader.
name: Scrafty

description_x: The guardians of an ancient city, they use their psychic power to attack enemies that invade their territory.
description_y: The guardians of an ancient city, they always fly the same route while keeping watch for invaders.
name: Sigilyph

description_x: These Pokémon arose from the spirits of people interred in graves. Each retains memories of its former life.
description_y: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.
name: Yamask

description_x: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.
description_y: Grave robbers who mistake them for real coffins and get too close end up trapped inside their bodies.
name: Cofagrigus

description_x: About 100 million years ago, these Pokémon swam in oceans. It is thought they also went on land to attack prey.
description_y: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.
name: Tirtouga

description_x: They can live in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.
description_y: It could knock out a foe with a slap from one of its developed front appendages and chew it up, shell or bones and all.
name: Carracosta

description_x: Revived from a fossil, this Pokémon is thought to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon.
description_y: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.
name: Archen

description_x: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.
description_y: It runs better than it flies. It takes off into the sky by running at a speed of 25 mph.
name: Archeops

description_x: The combination of garbage bags and industrial waste caused the chemical reaction that created this Pokémon.
description_y: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.
name: Trubbish

description_x: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.
description_y: Consuming garbage makes new kinds of poison gases and liquids inside their bodies.
location_x:
Lost Hotel, Pokémon Village
Friend Safari
location_y:
Lost Hotel, Pokémon Village
Friend Safari
name: Garbodor

description_x: It changes so it looks like its foe, tricks it, and then uses that opportunity to flee.
description_y: To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.
name: Zorua

description_x: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
description_y: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.
name: Zoroark

description_x: Minccino greet each other by grooming one another thoroughly with their tails
description_y: These Pokémon prefer a tidy habitat. They are always sweeping and dusting, using their tails as brooms.
name: Minccino

description_x: Their white fur feels amazing to touch. Their fur repels dust and prevents static electricity from building up.
description_y: Cinccino's body is coated in a special oil that helps it deflect attacks, such as punches.
name: Cinccino

description_x: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.
description_y: They intently observe both Trainers and Pokémon. Apparently, they are looking at something that only Gothita can see.
name: Gothita

description_x: Starlight is the source of their power. At night, they mark star positions by using psychic power to float stones.
description_y: According to many old tales, it creates friends for itself by controlling sleeping children on starry nights.
name: Gothorita

description_x: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
description_y: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.
name: Gothitelle

description_x: Because their bodies are enveloped in a special liquid, they are fine in any environment, no matter how severe.
description_y: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.
name: Solosis

description_x: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.
description_y: When their two divided brains think the same thoughts, their psychic power is maximized.
name: Duosion

description_x: They use psychic power to control their arms, which are made of a special liquid. They can crush boulders psychically.
description_y: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.
name: Reuniclus

description_x: When attacked, it uses its feathers to splash water, escaping under cover of the spray.
description_y: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
name: Ducklett

description_x: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
description_y: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
name: Swanna

description_x: The temperature of their breath is -58 degrees Fahrenheit. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the area around them.
description_y: This Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. It sleeps buried in snow.
name: Vanillite

description_x: They cool down the surrounding air and create ice particles, which they use to freeze their foes.
description_y: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon's habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.
name: Vanillish

description_x: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
description_y: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.
name: Vanilluxe

description_x: Their coloring changes according to the season and can be slightly affected by the temperature and humidity as well.
description_y: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokémon's fur. People use it to mark the seasons.
name: Deerling

description_x: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck's horns
description_y: They migrate according to the seasons, so some people call Sawsbuck the harbingers of spring.
name: Sawsbuck

description_x: They live on treetops and glide using the inside of a cape-like membrane while discharging electricity.
description_y: The energy made in its cheeks' electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.
name: Emolga

description_x: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.
description_y: For some reason they evolve when they receive electrical energy while they are attacking Shelmet.
name: Karrablast

description_x: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
description_y: These Pokémon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.
name: Escavalier

description_x: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.
description_y: It lures Pokémon with its pattern that looks just like a Poké Ball, then releases poison spores.
location_x: Route 15, Route 16, Route 20, Victory Road, Pokémon Village
location_y: Route 15, Route 16, Route 20, Victory Road, Pokémon Village
name: Foongus

description_x: They show off their Poké Ball caps to lure prey, but very few Pokémon are fooled by this.
description_y: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.
name: Amoonguss

description_x: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.
description_y: If its veil-like arms stun and wrap a foe, that foe will be dragged miles below the surface, never to return.
name: Frillish

description_x: Its body is mostly seawater. It's said there's a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
description_y: The fate of the ships and crew that wander into Jellicent's habitat: all sunken, all lost, all vanished.
name: Jellicent

description_x: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.
description_y: It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.
name: Alomomola

description_x: Since it can't generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs static electricity.
description_y: They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorbs static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.
name: Joltik

description_x: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
description_y: When attacked, they create an electric barrier by spitting out many electrically charged threads.
name: Galvantula

description_x: When threatened, it attacks by shooting a barrage of spikes, which gives it a chance to escape by rolling away.
description_y: It absorbs the iron it finds in the rock while clinging to the ceiling. It shoots spikes when in danger.
location_x:
Glittering Cave, Reflection Cave
Friend Safari
location_y:
Glittering Cave, Reflection Cave
Friend Safari
name: Ferroseed

description_x: By swinging around its three spiky feelers and shooting spikes, it can obliterate an opponent.
description_y: They attach themselves to cave ceilings, firing steel spikes at targets passing beneath them.
name: Ferrothorn

description_x: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
description_y: The two minigears that mesh together are predetermined. Each will rebound from other minigears without meshing.
name: Klink

description_x: By changing the direction in which it rotates, it communicates its feeling to others. When angry, it rotates faster.
description_y: A minigear and big gear comprise its body. If the minigear it launches at a foe doesn't return, it will die.
name: Klang

description_x: The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed for a rapid energy charge.
description_y: Its red core functions as an energy tank. It fires the charged energy through its spikes into an area.
name: Klinklang

description_x: While one alone doesn't have much power, a chain of many Tynamo can be as powerful as lightning.
description_y: One alone can emit only a trickle of electricity, so a group of them gathers to unleash a powerful electric shock.
name: Tynamo

description_x: It wraps itself around its prey and paralyzes it with electricity from the round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.
description_y: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.
name: Eelektrik

description_x: With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey. Then they use their fangs to shock the prey with electricity.
description_y: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
name: Eelektross

description_x: It uses its strong psychic power to squeeze its opponent's brain, causing unendurable headaches.
description_y: Rumors of its origin are linked to a UFO crash site in the desert 50 years ago.
name: Elgyem

description_x: Apparently, it communicates by flashing its three fingers, but those patterns haven't been decoded.
description_y: It uses psychic power to control an opponent's brain and tamper with its memories.
name: Beheeyem

description_x: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
description_y: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
name: Litwick

description_x: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
description_y: It arrives near the moment of death and steals the spirit from the body.
name: Lampent

description_x: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.
description_y: The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their way and wander this world forever.
name: Chandelure

description_x: They use their tusks to crush the berries they eat. Repeated regrowth makes their tusks strong and sharp.
description_y: They mark their territory by leaving gashes in trees with their tusks. If a tusk breaks, a new one grows in quickly.
name: Axew

description_x: Their tusks can shatter rocks. Territory battles between Fraxure can be intensely violent.
description_y: A broken tusk will not grow back, so it diligently sharpens its tusks on river rocks after the end of a battle.
name: Fraxure

description_x: They are kind but can be relentless when defending territory. They challenge foes with tusks that can cut steel.
description_y: Their sturdy tusks will stay sharp even if used to cut steel beams. These Pokémon are covered in hard armor.
name: Haxorus

description_x: Its nose is always running. It sniffs the snot back up because the mucus provides the raw material for its moves.
description_y: Their snot is a barometer of health. When healthly, their snot is sticky and the power of their ice moves increases.
name: Cubchoo

description_x: They love the cold seas of the north. They create pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their own breath.
description_y: It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.
name: Beartic

description_x: They are born in snow clouds. They use chains made of ice crystals to capture prey.
description_y: They are composed of ice crystals. They capture prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at -148 degrees Fahrenheit.
name: Cryogonal

description_x: When it and Karrablast are together, and both receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.
description_y: It evolves when bathed in an electric-like energy along with Karrablast. The reason is still unknown.
name: Shelmet

description_x: Having removed its heavy shell, it becomes very light and can fight with ninja-like movements.
description_y: When its body dries out, it weakens. So, to prevent dehydration, it wraps itself in many layers of thin membrane.
name: Accelgor

description_x: Its skin is very hard, so it is unhurt even if stepped on by sumo wrestlers. It smiles when transmitting electricity.
description_y: It conceals itself in the mud of the seashore. Then it waits. When prey touch it, it delivers a jolt of electricity.
name: Stunfisk

description_x: It takes pride in the speed at which it can use moves. What it loses in power, it makes up for in quantity.
description_y: In fights, they dominate with onslaughts of flowing, continuous attacks. With their sharp claws, they cut enemies.
name: Mienfoo

description_x: It wields the fur on its arms like a whip. Its arm attacks come with such rapidity that they cannot ever be seen.
description_y: Using the long fur on its arms like whips, it launches into combo attacks that, once started, no one can stop.
name: Mienshao

description_x: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.
description_y: It warms its body by absorbing sunlight with its wings. When its body temperature falls, it can no longer move.
name: Druddigon

description_x: The energy that burns inside it enables it to move, but no one has yet been able to identify this energy.
description_y: Ancient science fashioned this Pokémon from clay. It's been active for thousands of years.
name: Golett

description_x: It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect people and Pokémon by the ancient people who made them.
description_y: It flies across the sky at Mach speeds. Removing the seal on its chest makes its internal energy go out of control.
name: Golurk

description_x: Blades comprise this Pokémon's entire body. If battling dulls the blades, it sharpens them on stones by the river.
description_y: Ignoring their injuries, groups attack by sinking the blades that cover their bodies into their prey.
name: Pawniard

description_x: The pitiless Pokémon commands a group of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility. It then moves in to finish the prey off.
description_y: Bisharp pursues prey in the company of a large group of Pawniard. Then Bisharp finishes off the prey.
name: Bisharp

description_x: They charge wildly and headbutt everything. Their headbutts have enough destructive force to derail a train.
description_y: Their fluffy fur absorbs damage, even if they strike foes with a fierce headbutt.
name: Bouffalant

description_x: They crush berries with their talons. They bravely stand up to any opponent, no matter how strong it is.
description_y: They will challenge anything, even strong opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help them become stronger.
name: Rufflet

description_x: For the sake of its friends, this brave warrior of the sky will not stop battling, even if injured.
description_y: They fight for their friends without any thought about danger to themselves. One can carry a car while flying.
name: Braviary

description_x: Its wings are too tiny to allow it to fly. As the time approaches for it to evolve, it discards the bones it was wearing.
description_y: Their wings are too tiny to allow them to fly. They guard their posteriors with bones that were gathered by Mandibuzz.
name: Vullaby

description_x: They fly in circles around the sky. When they spot prey, they attack and carry it back to their nest with ease.
description_y: Watching from the sky, they swoop to strike weakened Pokémon on the ground. They decorate themselves with bones.
name: Mandibuzz

description_x: Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues, they burn through Durant's steel bodies and consume their insides.
description_y: It draws in air through its tail, transforms it into fire, and uses it like a tongue. It melts Durant and eats them.
name: Heatmor

description_x: Individuals each play different roles in driving Heatmor, their natural predator, away from their colony.
description_y: They attack in groups, covering themselves in steel armor to protect themselves from Heatmor.
name: Durant

description_x: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds
description_y: Lacking sight, it's unaware of its surroundings, so it bumps into things and eats anything that moves.
name: Deino

description_x: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.
description_y: After it has eaten up all the food in its territory, it moves to another area. Its two heads do not get along.
name: Zweilous

description_x: The heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
description_y: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokémon devours everything in its path!
name: Hydreigon

description_x: Said to have been born from the sun, it spews fire from its horns and encases itself in a cocoon of fire when it evolves.
description_y: The base of volcanoes is where they make their homes. They shoot fire from their five horns to repel attacking enemies.
name: Larvesta

description_x: A sea of fire engulfs the surroundings of their battles, since they use their six wings to scatter their ember scales.
description_y: When volcanic ash darkened the atmosphere, it is said that Volcarona's fire provided a replacement for the sun.
name: Volcarona

description_x: It has a body and heart of steel. Its glare is sufficient to make even an unruly Pokémon obey it.
description_y: It has a body and heart of steel. It worked with its allies to punish people when they hurt Pokémon.
name: Cobalion

description_x: Its charge is strong enough to break through a giant castle wall in one blow. This Pokémon is spoken of in legends.
description_y: Spoken of in legend, this Pokémon used its phenomenal power to destroy a castle in its effort to protect Pokémon.
name: Terrakion

description_x: Its head sprouts horns as sharp as blades. Using whirlwind-like movements, it confounds and swiftly cuts opponents.
description_y: Legends say this Pokémon confounded opponents with its swift movements.
name: Virizion

description_x: The lower half of its body is wrapped in a cloud of energy. It zooms through the sky at 200 mph.
description_y: Tornadus expels massive energy from its tail, causing severe storms. Its power is great enough to blow houses away.
evYield:
Incarnate Forme
3 Attack Point(s)
Therian Forme
3 Speed Point(s)
name: Tornadus

description_x: The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off lightning bolts.
description_y: As it flies around, it shoots lightning all over the place and causes forest fires. It is therefore disliked.
evYield:
Incarnate Forme
3 Attack Point(s)
Therian Forme
3 Sp. Attack Point(s)
name: Thundurus

description_x: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with fire. It helps those who want to build a world of truth.
description_y: When Reshiram's tail flares, the heat energy moves the atmosphere and changes the world's weather.
name: Reshiram

description_x: This legendary Pokémon can scorch the world with lightning. It assists those who want to build an ideal world.
description_y: Concealing itself in lightning clouds, it flies throughout the Unova region. It creates electricity in its tail.
name: Zekrom

description_x: Lands visited by Landorus grant such bountiful crops that it has been hailed as "The Guardian of the Fields."
description_y: From the forces of lightning and wind, it creates energy to give nutrients to the soil and make the land abundant.
evYield:
Incarnate Forme
3 Sp. Attack Point(s)
Therian Forme
3 Attack Point(s)
name: Landorus

description_x: This legendary ice Pokémon waits for a hero to fill in the missing parts of its body with truth or ideals.
description_y: It generates a powerful, freezing energy inside itself, but its body became frozen when the energy leaked out.
evYield:
Kyurem
1 HP Point(s)
1 Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Attack Point(s)
Black Kyurem
3 Attack Point(s)
White Kyurem
3 Sp. Attack Point(s)
name: Kyurem

description_x: It crosses the world, running over the surfaces of oceans and rivers. It appears at scenic waterfronts.
description_y: When it is resolute, its body fills with power and it becomes swifter. Its jumps are then too fast to follow.
name: Keldeo

description_x: The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.
description_y: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.
evYield:
Aria Forme
1 Speed Point(s)
1 Sp. Attack Point(s)
1 Sp. Defense Point(s)
Pirouette Forme
1 Attack Point(s)
1 Defense Point(s)
1 Speed Point(s)
name: Meloetta

description_x: This ancient bug Pokémon was altered by Team Plasma. They upgraded the cannon on its back.
description_y: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
evYield:
1 Attack Point(s)
1 Speed Point(s)
1 Sp. Attack Point(s)
name: Genesect

description_x: The quills on its head are usually soft. When it flexes them, the points become so hard and sharp that they can pierce rock.
description_y: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn't faze it.
name: Chespin

description_x: It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators' attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.
description_y: They strengthen their lower bodies by running into one another. They are very kind and won't start fights.
name: Quilladin

description_x: Its Tackle is forceful enough to flip a 50-ton tank. It shields its allies from danger with its own body.
description_y: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.
name: Chesnaught

description_x: Eating a twig fills it with energy, and its roomy ears give vent to air hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.
description_y: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.
name: Fennekin

description_x: It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.
description_y: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.
name: Braixen

description_x: It gazes into the flame at the tip of its branch to achieve a focused state, which allows it to see into the future.
description_y: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.
name: Delphox

description_x: It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back. The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise take when attacked.
description_y: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
name: Froakie

description_x: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.
description_y: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute's time.
name: Frogadier

description_x: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.
description_y: It appears and vanishes with a ninja's grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.
name: Greninja

description_x: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.
description_y: It has ears like shovels. Digging holes strengthens its ears so much that they can sever thick roots effortlessly.
name: Bunnelby

description_x: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.
description_y: As powerful as an excavator, its ears can reduce dense bedrock to rubble. When it's finished digging, it lounges lazily.
name: Diggersby

description_x: These friendly Pokémon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.
description_y: Despite the beauty of its lilting voice, it's merciless to intruders that enter its territory.
name: Fletchling

description_x: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
description_y: The hotter the flame sac on its belly, the faster it can fly, but it takes some time to get the fire going.
name: Fletchinder

description_x: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.
description_y: When attacking prey, it can reach speeds of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off with a colossal kick.
name: Talonflame

description_x: When under attack from bird Pokémon, it spews a poisonous black powder that causes paralysis on contact.
description_y: The powder that covers its body regulates its temperature, so it can live in any region or climate.
name: Scatterbug

description_x: It lives hidden within thicket shadows. When predators attack, it quickly bristles the fur covering its body in an effort to threaten them.
description_y: The beaks of bird Pokémon can't begin to scratch its stalwart body. To defend itself, it spews powder.
name: Spewpa

description_x: Vivillon with many different patterns are found all over the world. These patterns are affected by the climate of their habitat.
description_y: The patterns on this Pokémon's wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.
name: Vivillon
notes: Vivillon's form is aesthetic and is dependant upon the geographic location set on your 3DS

description_x: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.
description_y: They set off on their own from their pride and live by themselves to become stronger. These hot-blooded Pokémon are quick to fight.
name: Litleo

description_x: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
description_y: With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger. The females protect the pride's cubs.
name: Pyroar

description_x: It draws out and controls the hidden power of flowers. The flower Flabébé holds is most likely part of its body.
description_y: When it finds a flower it likes, it dwells on that flower its whole life long. It floats in the wind's embrace with an untroubled heart.
name: Flabébé

description_x: It flutters around fields of flowers and cares for flowers that are starting to wilt. It draws out the hidden power of flowers to battle.
description_y: When the flowers of a well-tended flower bed bloom, it appears and celebrates with an elegant dance.
name: Floette

description_x: It claims exquisite flower gardens as its territory, and it obtains power from basking in the energy emitted by flowering plants.
description_y: In times long past, governors of castles would invite Florges to create flower gardens to embellish the castle domains.
name: Florges

description_x: Thought to be one of the first Pokémon to live in harmony with humans, it has a placid disposition.
description_y: If it has sunshine and water, it doesnt need to eat, because it can generate energy from the leaves on its back.
name: Skiddo

description_x: It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by subtle shifts in the grip on its horns. This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.
description_y: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.
name: Gogoat

description_x: It does its best to be taken seriously by its enemies, but its glare is not sufficiently intimidating. Chewing on a leaf is its trademark.
description_y: It does its level best to glare and pull a scary face, but it can't help grinning if anyone pats its head.
name: Pancham

description_x: Although it posses a violent temperament, it won't put up with bullying. It uses the leaf in its mouth to sense the movements of its enemies.
description_y: It charges ahead and bashes its opponents like a berserker, uncaring about any hits it might take. Its arms are mighty enough to snap a telephone pole.
name: Pangoro

description_x: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
description_y: Historically, in the Kalos region, these Pokémon were the designated guardians of the king.
name: Furfrou

description_x: The organ that emits its intense psychic power is sheltered by its ears to keep power from leaking out.
description_y: It has enough psychic energy to blast everything within 300 feet of itself, but it has no control over its power.
name: Espurr

description_x: When in danger, it raises its ears and releases enough psychic power to grind a 10-ton truck into dust.
description_y: The eyeball patterns on the interior of its ears emit psychic energy. It keeps the patterns tightly covered because that power is too immense.
name: Meowstic

description_x: Apparently this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit inhabits a sword. It attaches itself to people and drinks their life force.
description_y: If anyone dares to grab its hilt, it wraps a blue cloth around that person's arm and drains that person's life energy completely.
name: Honedge

description_x: When Honedge evolves, it divides into two swords, which cooperate via telepathy to coordinate attacks and slash their enemies to ribbons.
description_y: The complex attack patterns of its two swords are unstoppable, even for an opponent greatly accomplished at swordplay.
name: Doublade

description_x: Generations of kings were attended by these Pokémon, which used their spectral power to manipulate and control people and Pokémon.
description_y: Apparently, it can detect innate qualities of leadership. According to legend, whoever it recognizes is destined to become king.
name: Aegislash

description_x: It emits a scent that enraptures those who smell it. This fragance changes depending on what it has eaten.
description_y: In the past, rather than using perfume, royal ladies carried a Spritzee that would waft a fragrance they liked.
name: Spritzee

description_x: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.
description_y: Its scent is so overpowering that, unless a Trainer happens to really enjoy the smell, he or she will have a hard time walking alongside it.
name: Aromatisse

description_x: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and sticky as cotton candy.
description_y: Because it eats nothing but sweets, its fur is as sticky sweet as cotton candy.
name: Swirlix

description_x: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.
description_y: Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than a human's, so even the faintest scent tells it about everything in the area. It's like it can see with its nose!
name: Slurpuff

description_x: Opponents who stare at the flashing of the light-emitting spots on its body become dazed and lose their will to fight.
description_y: It flashes the light-emitting spots on its body, which drains its opponent's will to fight. It takes the opportunity to scuttle away and hide.
name: Inkay

description_x: It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do whatever it wants.
description_y: It lures its prey close with hypnotic motions, then wraps its tentacles around it before finishing it off with digestive fluids.
name: Malamar

description_x: Two Binacle live together on one rock. When they fight, one of them will move to a different rock.
description_y: They stretch and then contract, yanking their rocks along with them in bold hops. They eat seaweed that washes up on the shoreline.
location_x: Route 8, Route 12, Ambrette Town, Cyllage City - Rock Smash
location_y: Route 8, Route 12, Ambrette Town, Cyllage City - Rock Smash
name: Binacle

description_x: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.
description_y: Barbaracle's legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head's orders.
name: Barbaracle

description_x: Camouflaged as rotten kelp, they spray liquid poison on prey that approaches unawares and then finish it off.
description_y: It looks just like rotten kelp. It hides from foes while storing up power for its evolution.
location_y: Route 8, Ambrette Town, Cyllage City - Fish
name: Skrelp

description_x: Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.
description_y: Tales are told of ships that wander into seas where Dragalge live, never to return.
location_y: Route 8, Ambrette Town, Cyllage City - Fish
name: Dragalge

description_x: They knock down flying prey by firing compressed water from their massive claws like shooting a pistol.
description_y: Through controlled explosions of internal gas, it can expel water like a pistol shot. At close distances, it can shatter rock.
location_x: Route 8, Ambrette Town, Cyllage City - Fish
name: Clauncher

description_x: Their enormous claws launch cannonballs of water powerful enough to pierce tanker hulls.
description_y: By expelling water from the nozzle in the back of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.
location_x: Route 8, Ambrette Town, Cyllage City - Fish
name: Clawitzer

description_x: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
description_y: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.
name: Helioptile

description_x: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.
description_y: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.
name: Heliolisk

description_x: This Pokémon was restored from a fossil. If something happens that it doesn't like, it throws a tantrum and runs wild.
description_y: Its immense jaws have enough destructive force that it can chew up an automobile. It lived 100 million years ago.
name: Tyrunt

description_x: Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.
description_y: Nothing could stop this Pokémon 100 million years ago, so it behaved like a king.
name: Tyrnatrum

description_x: This ancient Pokémon was restored from part of its body that had been frozen in ice for over 100 million years.
description_y: This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.
name: Amaura

description_x: The diamond-shaped crystals on its body expel air as cold as -240 degrees Fahrenheit, surrounding its enemies and encasing them in ice.
description_y: Using its diamond-shaped crystals, it can instantly create a wall of ice to block an opponent's attack.
name: Aurorus

description_x: It sends a soothing aura from its ribbonlike feelers to calm fights.
description_y: It wraps its ribbonlike feelers around the arm of its beloved Trainer and walks with him or her.
name: Sylveon

description_x: Although its body is small, its proficient fighting skills enable it to keep up with big bruisers like Machamp and Hariyama.
description_y: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.
name: Hawlucha

description_x: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.
description_y: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.
name: Dedenne

description_x: Born from the temperatures and pressures deep underground, it fires beams from the stone in its head.
description_y: It has slept underground for hundreds of millions of years since its birth. It's occasionally found during the excavation of caves.
name: Carbink

description_x: The weakest Dragon-Type Pokémon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn't dry out.
description_y: It's covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.
name: Goomy

description_x: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can't see anything.
description_y: Its four horns are a high-performance radar system. It uses them to sense sounds and smells, rather than using ears or a nose.
name: Sliggoo

description_x: This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.
description_y: It attacks with retractable horns. It throws a punch that's the equivalent of the force of a hundred pro boxers.
name: Goodra

description_x: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.
description_y: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.
name: Klefki

description_x: These Pokémon are created when spirits possess rotten tree stumps. They prefer to live in abandoned forests.
description_y: According to old tales, these Pokémon are stumps possessed by the spirits of children who died while lost in the forest.
name: Phantump

description_x: It can control trees at will. It will trap people who harm the forest, so they can never leave.
description_y: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It's kind to the Pokémon that reside in its body.
name: Trevenant

description_x: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.
description_y: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.
name: Pumpkaboo

description_x: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
description_y: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.
name: Gourgeist

description_x: It blocks opponents' attacks with the ice that shields its body. It uses cold air to repair any cracks with new ice.
description_y: Using air of -150 degrees Fahrenheit, they freeze opponents solid. They live in herds above the snow line on mountains.
name: Bergmite

description_x: Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel. Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that stands in its way.
description_y: The way several Bergmite huddle on its back makes it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice.
name: Avalugg

description_x: They live in pitch-black caves. Their enormous ears can emit ultrasonic waves of 200,000 hertz.
description_y: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.
location_x:
Terminus Cave, Victory Road
Friend Safari
location_y:
Terminus Cave, Victory Road
Friend Safari
name: Noibat

description_x: They fly around on moonless nights and attack careless prey. Nothing can beat them in a battle in the dark.
description_y: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.
name: Noivern

description_x: Legends say it can share eternal life. It slept for a thousand years in the form of a tree before its revival.
description_y: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.
name: Xerneas

description_x: When this legendary Pokémon's wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.
description_y: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.
name: Yveltal

description_x: When the Kalos region's ecosystem falls into disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.
description_y: It's hypothesized that it's monitoring those who destroy the ecosystem from deep in the cave where it lives.
name: Zygarde

description_x: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.
description_y: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.
name: Diancie

description_x: It gathers things it likes and pushes them through its loop to teleport them to a secret place.
description_y: This troublemaker sends anything and everything to faraway places using its loop, which can warp space
name: Hoopa

description_x: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.
description_y: It lets out billows of steam and disappears into the dense fog. It's said to live in mountains where humans do not tread.
name: Volcanion
